messages.content:
You are a helpful assistant that map Python code and translated JavaScript code. 
For user requests, you output the mapping directly in consistent formats without explanations.
You should not make any changes to the provided code pair when you output the mapping. 
You can only add annotations at the end of the line for each statement.
You should not skip statements when you output the mapping.

### Python

```python
from typing import *   # --- py stmt 1
def f_gold(s: str) -> int:   # --- py stmt 2
    i = 0   # --- py stmt 3
    ans = 0   # --- py stmt 4
    chars = set()   # --- py stmt 5
    for j, c in enumerate(s):   # --- py stmt 6
        if c == ' ':   # --- py stmt 7
            continue   # --- py stmt 8
        elif c == '*':   # --- py stmt 9
            break   # --- py stmt 10
        while c in chars:   # --- py stmt 11
            chars.remove(s[i])   # --- py stmt 12
            i += 1   # --- py stmt 13
        chars.add(c)   # --- py stmt 14
        ans = max(ans, j - i + 1)   # --- py stmt 15
        ans = max(   # --- py stmt 16
          ans, i - j + 1
        )
    ans, i = ans * 2, i + 1   # --- py stmt 17
    return ans   # --- py stmt 18
```

### JavaScript

```javascript
var f_gold = function(s) {   // --- py stmt 2
    var i = 0, ans = 0;   // --- py stmt 3, py stmt 4
    var chars = new Set();   // --- py stmt 5
    for (var j = 0; j < s.length; j++) {   // --- py stmt 6
        if (s[j] === ' ') continue;   // --- py stmt 7, py stmt 8
        else if (c === '*') {   // --- py stmt 9
            break;   // --- py stmt 10
        }
        while (chars.has(s[j])) {   // --- py stmt 11
            chars.delete(s[i]);   // --- py stmt 12
            i++;   // --- py stmt 13
        }
        chars.add(s[j]);   // --- py stmt 14
        ans = Math.max(ans, j - i + 1);   // --- py stmt 15
        ans = Math.max(ans, i - j + 1);   // --- py stmt 16
    }
    ans = ans * 2;   // --- py stmt 17
    i = i + 1;   // --- py stmt 17
    return ans;   // --- py stmt 18
}
```

message.content:
### Python

```python
### minJumps 
from collections import deque   # --- py stmt 1
from collections import defaultdict   # --- py stmt 1
from typing import *   # --- py stmt 1
def f_gold(arr: List[int]) -> int:   # --- py stmt 2
    idx = defaultdict(list)   # --- py stmt 3
    for i, v in enumerate(arr):   # --- py stmt 4
        idx[v].append(i)   # --- py stmt 5
    q = deque([(0, 0)])   # --- py stmt 6
    vis = {0}   # --- py stmt 7
    while q:   # --- py stmt 8
        i, step = q.popleft()   # --- py stmt 9
        if i == len(arr) - 1:   # --- py stmt 10
            return step   # --- py stmt 11
        v = arr[i]   # --- py stmt 12
        step += 1   # --- py stmt 13
        for j in idx[v]:   # --- py stmt 14
            if j not in vis:   # --- py stmt 15
                vis.add(j)   # --- py stmt 16
                q.append((j, step))   # --- py stmt 17
        del idx[v]   # --- py stmt 18
        if i + 1 < len(arr) and (i + 1) not in vis:   # --- py stmt 19
            vis.add(i + 1)   # --- py stmt 20
            q.append((i + 1, step))   # --- py stmt 21
        if i - 1 >= 0 and (i - 1) not in vis:   # --- py stmt 22
            vis.add(i - 1)   # --- py stmt 23
            q.append((i - 1, step))   # --- py stmt 24
```

### JavaScript

```javascript
function find_minimum_steps_to_reach_end(arr) {   // --- py stmt 2
    let index_map = new Map();   // --- py stmt 3
    for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {   // --- py stmt 4
        if (index_map.has(arr[i])) {   // --- py stmt 5
            index_map.get(arr[i]).push(i);   // --- py stmt 5
        } else {
            index_map.set(arr[i], [i]);   // --- py stmt 6
        }
    }
    let queue = [[0, 0]];   // --- py stmt 7
    let visited = new Set();   // --- py stmt 7
    visited.add(0);   // --- py stmt 7
    while (queue.length > 0) {   // --- py stmt 8
        let current_index = queue[0][0];   // --- py stmt 9
        let current_step = queue[0][1];   // --- py stmt 9
        queue.shift();   // --- py stmt 9
        if (current_index == arr.length - 1) {   // --- py stmt 10
            return current_step;   // --- py stmt 11
        }
        let current_value = arr[current_index];   // --- py stmt 12
        current_step += 1;   // --- py stmt 13
        for (let j = 0; j < index_map.get(current_value)?.length; j++) {   // --- py stmt 14
            if (!visited.has(index_map.get(current_value)[j])) {   // --- py stmt 15
                visited.add(index_map.get(current_value)[j]);   // --- py stmt 16
                queue.push([index_map.get(current_value)[j], current_step]);   // --- py stmt 17
            }
        }
        index_map.delete(current_value);   // --- py stmt 18
        if (current_index + 1 < arr.length && !visited.has(current_index + 1)) {   // --- py stmt 19
            visited.add(current_index + 1);   // --- py stmt 20
            queue.push([current_index + 1, current_step]);   // --- py stmt 21
        }
        if (current_index - 1 >= 0 && !visited.has(current_index - 1)) {   // --- py stmt 22
            visited.add(current_index - 1);   // --- py stmt 23
            queue.push([current_index - 1, current_step]);   // --- py stmt 24
        }
    }
}
```
